comments.body: !! we exceeded the 20 values that hashValues() supports?! Blimey. Filed https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/1356.

I picked the color that matched the accent color used by MD for the dark theme date picker examples: https://www.google.com/design/spec/components/pickers.html#pickers-date-pickers

The accentColor we had been using often didn't work with the dark. It's possible that applications will need to be more assertive about the accent color, there's a lot of variety in the MD spec.
I thought this was what `accentColorBrightness` was about. You have to handle the case of it being bright and it being dark.
this should gets its value from a getter in foundation/platform.dart
and that getter should throw an exception saying that a new enum should be added if it's a new platform
